analysis.description:
WhitelistedPausableToken.whitelistActive (/unique_chucks/4/0x8207c1ffc5b6804f6024322ccf34f29c3541ae26.sol#508-511) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < whitelistExpiration (/unique_chucks/4/0x8207c1ffc5b6804f6024322ccf34f29c3541ae26.sol#508-511)

WhitelistedPausableToken.setWhitelistExpiration (/unique_chucks/4/0x8207c1ffc5b6804f6024322ccf34f29c3541ae26.sol#521-552) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(_expiration >= block.timestamp + 86400,whitelist expiration not far enough into the future) (/unique_chucks/4/0x8207c1ffc5b6804f6024322ccf34f29c3541ae26.sol#540-548)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(_expiration >= block.timestamp + 86400,whitelist expiration not far enough into the future)
